haReport:
This mission was flown by:
Kmdr Patrik Schorner
Ltn Berthold Lehning
Fw Gebhard Schonbaum
Uffz Karl Nostitz

 The mission was flown from Balatre aerodrome.

Successes include the following: 
On 27/07/1916 near Camp.
A F.E.2b of Esc 21 was brought down by Erhard Kesselring of Jasta 16b.
S/Lt Leo Leroux was killed in action.
Lt Etienne Porte was killed in action.
Erhard Kesselring was  flying a Halberstadt D.II.


Pilots lost were: 
    Ltn Berthold Lehning: Captured
